request:
improve JSON tree UI styling and bracket alignment

## UI Improvements
- Remove vertical border lines from leaf nodes (only show on parent nodes)
- Ensure added/new nodes display green background instead of yellow
- Fix bracket alignment by removing double indentation from closing brackets

## Changes Made
### JsonTreeView.tsx
- Added has-children/leaf-node classes to differentiate node types
- Removed json-node class from closing bracket containers to prevent double padding
- Fixed inline style calculations for proper bracket alignment

### JsonTreeView.css
- Updated CSS selectors to only show borders on parent nodes with has-children class
- Added !important to green background for added nodes to override conflicts
- Maintained subtle, modern color scheme with proper contrast

## Visual Result
- Closing brackets ] and } now align with opening bracket lines
- Leaf nodes show background colors but no distracting border lines
- Added content clearly displays in green, not yellow
- Cleaner, more professional appearance
